backend_components.name: main.py
backend_components.purpose: Main FastAPI application entry point, defining all API endpoints and orchestrating services.

backend_components.name: config.py
backend_components.purpose: Defines application-wide settings and cloud provider configurations.

backend_components.name: database.py
backend_components.purpose: Manages database connection, session creation, and SQLAlchemy base.

backend_components.name: models.py
backend_components.purpose: Defines SQLAlchemy ORM models for database entities.

backend_components.name: schemas.py
backend_components.purpose: Defines Pydantic schemas for request and response data models.

backend_components.name: auth.py
backend_components.purpose: Handles user authentication, password hashing, JWT token creation, and verification.

backend_components.name: storage_providers/__init__.py
backend_components.purpose: Initializes the storage provider module and provides factory functions.

backend_components.name: storage_providers/base.py
backend_components.purpose: Abstract base class for all cloud storage providers.

backend_components.name: storage_providers/google_drive.py
backend_components.purpose: Implements the BaseProvider for Google Drive.

backend_components.name: storage_providers/onedrive.py
backend_components.purpose: Implements the BaseProvider for Microsoft OneDrive.

backend_components.name: utils.py
backend_components.purpose: Provides utility functions for security and file operations.

backend_components.name: app.py
backend_components.purpose: (Unclear purpose, potentially unused or alternative entry - assumed empty/minimal)

frontend_components.name: App.js
frontend_components.purpose: Main React application component, setting up routing and overall layout.

frontend_components.name: index.js
frontend_components.purpose: Entry point for the React application, renders App component and sets up global providers.

frontend_components.name: config.js
frontend_components.purpose: Defines frontend-specific configuration, primarily the backend API URL.

frontend_components.name: services/api.js
frontend_components.purpose: Centralized module for making API calls to the backend, handles authentication.

frontend_components.name: pages/Landing.js
frontend_components.purpose: Public landing page of the application.

frontend_components.name: pages/Login.js
frontend_components.purpose: Handles user login, authenticates with the backend, and redirects.

frontend_components.name: pages/Register.js
frontend_components.purpose: Handles new user registration, communicates with the backend, and redirects.

frontend_components.name: pages/ModeSelection.js
frontend_components.purpose: Page where users select their desired access mode.

frontend_components.name: pages/AuthCallback.js
frontend_components.purpose: Handles OAuth callback from cloud providers, processes tokens, and redirects.

frontend_components.name: pages/Dashboard.js
frontend_components.purpose: Displays an overview of connected storage accounts and triggers syncs.

frontend_components.name: pages/Files.js
frontend_components.purpose: Displays a list of all files, with filtering, searching, and sorting.

frontend_components.name: pages/Duplicates.js
frontend_components.purpose: Displays groups of duplicate files and allows removal.

frontend_components.name: components/Layout.js
frontend_components.purpose: Provides a consistent layout structure for the application.

frontend_components.name: components/PrivateRoute.js
frontend_components.purpose: Protects routes, ensuring only authenticated users can access them.

frontend_components.name: components/FileIcon.js
frontend_components.purpose: Utility component to display appropriate icons based on file type.
